title: [1.12.2][Future Versions——未来版本]在1.12.2里体验最新版本
author: Sinbad_Official
txt_content:
本帖最后由 321yu_wango 于 2020-3-14 12:20 编辑 

★ 介绍你可以收藏这个帖子以获得更及时的更新消息
舍不得拥有众多mod的1.12.2版本？想在1.12.2版本中游玩官方更新的全新版本？
Future Versions满足了你的想法！你可以在1.12.2中游览海底世界、对抗灾厄村民、在嗡嗡蜂群中偷家、前往地狱探秘了！
★ 物品添加了1.13的物品与方块蓝冰未雕刻的南瓜海带一系列物品木头（六面皆为树皮材质的方块）磨制岩石的台阶去皮木头1.14更新的新机器（包括旧版材质与新版材质）营火竹子甜浆果三叉戟迷之炖菜凋零玫瑰、铃兰、矢车菊所有石头台阶石化木头台阶旧版本材质的方块（其实添加了1.16的物品但是因为译名争论还未汉化=(:з」∠)_）

★ 截图



★ 汉化



zh_cn.lang
(4.21 KB, 下载次数: 1107)



2019-8-17 10:00 上传
点击文件名下载附件






★ 更新日志
FutureVersions V1.2.2 Added More Items
 - - Added Slow Fall Potion 
- Added Honeycombs
 - Added Honey Bottles 
* Added Crystallized Honey
 Added More Blocks
 - - Added Bee Nest 
- Added Bee Hive
 - Added Honey Block 
- Added Honeycomb Block
 - Added Smooth Quartz
 - Added Smooth Sandstone 
- Added Red Smooth Sandstone 
- Added Smooth Stone 
Added More Features to Campfires
- Added smoke to Campfires when you place a Hay Barrel underneath
 - Added damage when stepping on Campfires 
- Fixed a bug where Campfires (Old and New) could not be lit or unlit.
 Added Slabs For
 - - Smooth Quartz
 - Smooth Sandstone
 - Smooth Red Sandstone
 - Cut Sandstone 
- Cut Red Sandstone 
- Red Nether Brick Added Stairs For
 - - Stone - Andesite 
- Polished Andesite 
- Diorite - Polished Diorite
 - Granite - Polished Granite 
- Primarine - Prismarine Brick 
- Dark Prismarine 
-Mossy Stone Brick
 - Mossy Cobblestone 
- Smooth Sandstone 
- Smooth Red Sandstone
 - Red Nether Brick
 - End Stone Brick 
Added Walls For 
- - Andesite 
- Diorite 
- Granite 
- Mossy Stone Brick 
- Stone Brick 
- Mossy Cobblestone
 - Brick - Prismarine 
- Sandstone 
- Red Sandstone 
- Nether Brick 
- Red Nether Brick 
- End Stone Bricks Walls 
Added OreDictonary Support For
- - Uncarved Pumpkin 
- Old Cobblestone 
- All of the Wood 
- All of the Stripped Wood 
- Petrified Wood Slab 
- Old Brick 
- Old Gravel 
- Old Ore Blocks
- Dyes 
- Sponge 
- Old Grass 
- Changed how Coral spawns. 
- Changed the bell sound to match Minecraft. 
- Changed Blast Furnace to cost Smooth Stone 
- Fixed a bug where various "Old" blocks had the wrong sounds. 
- Fixed a bug where players could not craft Stone Slab.






[groupid=1536]Firefly Studio[/groupid]
